save_pre.title: Saving image.
save_pre.desc: The image saving will start shortly.

share_not_support.title: Something went wrong.
share_not_support.desc: Sharing is not supported on this browser.

share_error.title: Share interrupted
share_error.desc: Sharing was stopped or an issue occurred.

copy_error.title: Something went wrong.
copy_error.desc: An unexpected error occurred, image could not be copied.

mail_success.title: Copy successful
mail_success.desc: Please paste in the email body.

module.title: Upload an image to edit
module.desc: Drop an image here or paste from clipboard.
module.inform: Images are not uploaded to the server. Feel free to use it.

fail.title: No permission
fail.desc: Failed to load data from Google Drive.

fail.title: No permission
fail.desc: Failed to load data from Dropbox.

tool.replace_image_ment: All work will be lost. Replace anyway?

service.heading: Personal Data Collection and Use
service.content: Maskit does not collect any personal data during the service.

image.heading: Image Processing Policy
list: All image editing occurs locally on your browser.
Images are never sent to external servers.
Image data is processed on your device and is deleted automatically after the editing session ends.

secure.heading: Security
secure.content: Maskit values your privacy and takes the following security measures:
list: All image processing is done client-side (in your browser).
No user data is stored on servers.

update.heading: Privacy Policy Updates
update.content: This policy may be updated to reflect changes in law or service. Changes will be notified via the website.

inquiry.heading: Inquiries
inquiry.content: For questions regarding the privacy policy, please contact us at the email below.

list.title: Are images stored on a server?
list.desc: Images are not sent to a server.

list.title: Are there any usage limitations?
list.desc: Feel free to use it as you wish.

contents.title: Mask anything.
contents.desc: Use the mouse (or touch) to mask areas. You can resize and adjust the transparency of the masked parts.

contents.title: Try using emojis.
contents.desc: Decorate your images or add expression by using various emojis. You can easily adjust their size and position.

contents.title: Automatically hide text.
contents.desc: We provide a feature that detects text areas in an image and automatically hides them. Hide text with a single click.
